attributes.action: stop abortion between 13 & 16 without parents knowing
attributes.additional_details: II would like to change the law, so that a child between the ages of 13 & 16 can not get an abortion without the parents knowledge. It is against the law to have sex under 16, plus its to much of an emotional thing for a child to go throu without parents knowledge. Plus its a medical procedure & i think a parents has a right to know, especially in case they had any complications
